Reviews.Title: awesome purchased
Reviews.Author: naisa77
Reviews.Content: I purchased it for my husband as a Christmas gift.  Used for the first time in my son's church presentation and the picture looks great, the quality is awesome. We just love it. It was for him b ut we both enjoy it. I truly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: REALLY IMPRESSED
Reviews.Author: CarlosP
Reviews.Content: We just got it, but we are really glad we made this choice. We are taking pictures like mad.We have a lot to explore but this is our first semi pro camera and we are getting professional-looking pictures right away.

Reviews.Title: Fun camera with minor flaw.
Reviews.Author: Frawline
Reviews.Content: Camera is great fun. The camera bag in the bundle is worthless. That is  Beach Camera's fault.  The usb cord is RIDICULOUSLY too short. That is a Sony oversight.

ProductInfo.Name: Sony a3000 alpha a3000 ILCE-3000K/B, ILCE3000, Interchangeable Lens Digital 20.1MP Camera Bundle with 32GB High Speed Card, Spare Battery, Rapid Charger, SLR Guide DVD, UV filter, Padded Case, Mini HDMI Cable + More
